devdoc.details: The registrar controller should check this before allowing direct registration

params.name: The name to reserve for auction

returns.isPremiumName: Whether the name is in premium registry
returns.requiresAuction: Whether name must be purchased via auction

returns._0: isPremium Whether the name is premium

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: PremiumNameRegistry

addPremiumNameWithPrice(string,uint256).notice: Add a premium name with fixed price instead of auction

addPremiumNamesBatch(string[]).notice: Batch add premium names for auction

getPremiumInfo(string).notice: Get premium status and pricing info

isPremium(string).notice: Check if a name is premium

removePremiumName(string).notice: Remove a premium name from registry

userdoc.notice: Registry of premium names reserved for auction
